name: Disable Automatic Update for All Plugins
author: Boopathi Rajan

sections.description:
This plugin is an excellent solution for disabling automatic updates for all your WordPress plugins. With just a simple installation and activation, you can take control of the automatic update settings for all of your WordPress plugins. This gives you the power to manage updates manually, ensuring that you can thoroughly test each update before applying it to your site, thereby maintaining the stability and security of your WordPress installation.

Kindly let us know your feedback or comments to add more features in this plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Log in to your WordPress admin panel and go to Plugins -> Add New
  2. Type Disable Automatic Update for All Plugins in the search box and click on search button.
  3. Find Remove RSS Feed plugin.
  4. Then click on Install Now after that activate the plugin.

OR

  1. Download and save the Disable Automatic Update for All Plugins plugin to your hard disk.
  2. Login to your WordPress and go to the Add Plugins page.
  3. Click Upload Plugin button to upload the zip.
  4. Click Install Now to install and activate the plugin.
